intro: Corrigiola, commonly known as sea lentil or sea beans, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Caryophyllaceae. It consists of several species, most of which are found in coastal areas and saline environments. Their ability to thrive in harsh coastal climates makes them important components of maritime ecosystems.
